title: 求一款抽奖不重复的插件,spiot1.8.8
author: little_xi
txt_content:
一款会记录player之前抽中的东西
就是ABCD4个物品，之前抽过C，再抽只会在ABD里面抽

replies.author: gfjhf
replies.txt_content:
little_xi 发表于 2020-2-19 18:29
所以是哪种抽奖类型
貌似所有类型都是概率抽奖
没有记录这个东西
BlackListed-Permissions: []
#This allows users who have won the same prize before to get alternative prizes. They must of a BlackListed-Permission to get a alternative prize.
这个选项配置
玩家抽到了一个东西就给他一个权限，然后这个抽奖项的BlackListed-Permissions添加这个权限

replies.author: little_xi
replies.txt_content:
